mapper.sql: distinct m.id, m.parent_id as parentId, m.name, m.path, m.permission, m.component, m.icon, m.orderNum
mapper.select: select rm.permission from sys_role_menu rm left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id=#{id}

select from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = ur.user_id where m.enabled = 1 and u.username = #{name} order by m.orderNum

select m.permission from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = ur.user_id where m.enabled = 1 and u.username = #{username} order by m.orderNum
